issues.description: The sample usage in template Main.java uses two-argument constructors (e.g., new Seal("Clarabelle","marine")), but the problem statement and reference solution define Seal, Pig, and Goat with single-argument constructors (just the name). This mismatch will prevent students from compiling the provided Main.java sample and causes confusion about the intended constructor signature.
issues.suggested_fix: Modify the sample instantiation in Main.java to match the single-parameter constructors, e.g., new Seal("Clarabelle"), new Pig("Doodle"), new Goat("Buttinsky"), or alternatively, if a second attribute was intended, update the class constructors and UML to include that attribute consistently.
